description: This file defines the main React component for the notes application page, managing state for notes, selection, search, and CRUD operations through API calls. It renders the full layout including TopBar, Sidebar, and NoteEditor components.

methods.name: NotesPage
methods.description: Main React component managing notes state, rendering layout, and handling CRUD operations.

methods.name: handleNew
methods.description: Creates a new note via API and updates the state.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Saves the current note via API update and updates the notes list.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note via API and updates the notes list.
